posts.post_content:
Hey, I am interested in buying some EPDG cards in low grade to good grade. 

Anyone have some available?  

Sitting at 90 uniques so far with a few HOFers.  I have some 1's, I have some 5's, and everything in between. Tell me what you got!!!!

[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab121/thromdog/t206/total_1.jpg[/IMG]

Bump, still looking!  Trying to avoid trimmed cards but poor ones are fine.....

I have 15 so far and hoping to double that by end of the year.....help me out!
Still looking for EPDG cards if anyone has any they want to sell or trade.
I sent you an email via this site.  Email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Bill

2 month Bump. 

Have some money to spend, but not going to overspend....let me know what ya got!

Bump for first time in a while. Looking for all ranges, trimmed too.  Needs to have most of its back, but not all. ;)

Not looking to break the bank but I've been fair with pricing.
